Translations.Text: shapath hai bhor kee
tatha das raatriyon kee
aur jode tatha akele kee
aur raatri kee jab jaane lage
kya usamen kisee matimaan (samajhadaar) ke lie koee shapath hai
kya tumane nahin dekha ki tumhaare paalanahaar ne "aad" ke saat kya kiya
stambhon vaale "iram" ke saath
jinake samaan deshon mein log nahin paida kiye gaye
tatha "samood" ke saath jinhonne ghaatiyon me chattaanon ko kaat rakha tha
aur mekhon vaale firaun ke saath
jinhonne nagaron mein upadrav kar rakha tha
aur nagaron mein bada upadrav phaila rakha tha
phir tere paalanahaar ne unapar dand ka koda barasa diya
vaastav mein, tera paalanahaar ghaat mein hai
parantu, jab insaan kee usaka paalanahaar pareeksha leta hai aur use sammaan aur dhan deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paalanahaar ne mera sammaan kiya
parantu, jab usakee pareeksha lene ke lie usakee jeevika sankeern (kam) kar deta hai, to kahata hai ki mere paalanahaar ne mera apamaan kiya
aisa nahin, balki tum anaath ka aadar nahin karate
tatha gareeb ko khaana khilaane ke lie ek-doosare ko nahin ubhaarate
aur meeraas (mrtak sampatti) ke dhan ko samet-samet kar kha jaate ho
aur dhan se bada moh rakhate ho
saavadhaan! jab dharatee khand-khand kar dee jaayegee
aur tera paalanahaar svayan padaarvan karega aur farishte panktiyon mein honge
aur us din narak laayee jaayegee, us din insaan saavadhaan ho jaayega, kintu saavadhaanee laabh-daayak na hogee
